segments.text: Grand Theft Auto Three is awesome !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's more violent than TV news !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , my God , three hours already ! I have to get the chores done !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No time . That's their headlights in the window !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , emergency measures . Let's throw the dishes in the trash ! Two birds with one stone ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Little dude , your life is over !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No time to worry . We have to dispose of this evidence .
segments.speaker: S1
